div.head: Description of changes for 2013.01
div.p: This is the first public version of this text. It is a first draft copied fromm a diplomatic transcription of the St. Victor ms. A transcription of the Sorbonnene ms still awaits completiong. A collation comparision of available manuscripts will then be added; corrections and additions will follow. Difficult transcriptions spots have been marked as unclear. Most names elements have been linked to ttheir unique references. Citations, cross-references, and a critical apparatus still await constructions.
